actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for an accurate disclosure on individual pay checks of payments made under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the disclosure, on employee pay statements, of employer contributions under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.

titles.title: To provide for an accurate disclosure on individual pay checks of payments made under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act.
